overview:
Denise is a radio veteran and an early immigrant to digital media. She co-founded Binary Broadcasting and, more recently Shortform.com, an innovative app offering curated video streams and the creation of personal VJ channels.

Denise continues to consult media companies, helping them to develop and produce timely, high quality content for radio and new media. Her clients have included Discovery Communications, Sirius/XM, Forbes, Hachette Filipacchi, FoxRadio, the Associated Press and E!
